name: ADVentura - The Navigator - Ponce de Leon
additionalNotes: The ADVentura the Navigator offers a wonderful bouquet of mocha and roasted nut. While continuing this pleasure, some leathery spicy flavours with hints of toffee and caramel aromas delights the palate. A medium-strength cigar, the ADVentura The Navigator is hand rolled at the Tabacalera William Ventura factory in the Dominican Republic. A dark, sweet Mexican San Andres wrapper surrounds The Navigator’s Indonesian Sumatra binder, which houses premium tobaccos from Ecuador, Nicaragua, and the Dominican Republic. The ADVentura The Navigator has a spicy flavor profile that is accented caramel notes.
